data.title: The Universal Media Identifier
data.text:
EIDR, which stands for Entertainment Identifier Registry, is a public registry that provides a unique identifier for audiovisual content across the global entertainment industry. It was established to address the need for a standardized identification system that can uniquely identify and track various forms of entertainment content.

Imagine an identifier that you can share with all of your business partners, large or small, internal or external, simple or complex. That’s EIDR! EIDR is the DNA of the digital supply chain.

The EIDR community is an association of media and entertainment professionals from all corners of the industry.

Stay current by subscribing to our newsletter, follow us on LinkedIn, and attend our events.

If your organization is involved in creation, production, post production or distribution of content, you could realize significant monetary benefits from joining the EIDR Registry.

EIDR provides the industry with a universal unique identifier for all media assets. Films, Television shows, Podcasts, Radio Shows, etc.

EIDR costs less than other identifiers and it is universally accepted as the gold standard. When the entire digital supply chain is using a single identifier, it reduces costs by enabling automation between all systems, including those outside your network.

Imagine an identifier that you can share with all of your business partners, large or small, internal or external, simple or complex. That’s EIDR! With pricing that fits all business sizes, EIDR is the DNA of the digital supply chain.
